messages.title: Help Helen Korfanty stop a hard Brexit
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats are leading the campaign against the Conservatives' hard Brexit. Only a Lib Dem win in Bury St Edmunds, Newmarket and Needham Market & our villages can challenge the damaging 'hard' Brexit that will hit jobs, the economy and services.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Liberal Democrats are the only party that has always fought for Britain’s membership of the European Union, and that’s why we are fighting for you to have your say on the final Brexit deal.
Only the Liberal Democrats would give the NHS the funds it needs by raising a penny on income tax to provide an additional £6 billion for health and care services.

Local schools are under threat from a Conservative Party that has stopped listening to local people in the Bury St Edmunds/Stowmarket area. Schools in Suffolk are set to lose £30 million from their budgets.

issues.brexitEurope: Fighting against Hard Brexit. The Liberal Democrats are leading the campaign against the Conservatives' hard Brexit.
issues.economy: Only a Lib Dem win in Bury St Edmunds, Newmarket and Needham Market & our villages can challenge the damaging 'hard' Brexit that will hit jobs, the economy and services.
issues.education: Opposing school cuts. Local schools are under threat from a Conservative Party that has stopped listening to local people in the Bury St Edmunds/Stowmarket area. Schools in Suffolk are set to lose £30 million from their budgets.
issues.government: Only a Liberal Democrat vote can get real change for Britain.
issues.health: Only the Liberal Democrats would give the NHS the funds it needs by raising a penny on income tax to provide an additional £6 billion for health and care services.

leaflet.personalStatement: I believe that we must protect our NHS, care services and education; listening to local people and providing a strong voice... I have a strong record of helping local people, particularly the elderly and vulnerable...

contactInformation.address: 50 St. Andrews Road, Bury St Edmunds, IP33 3ES
